Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baconfiesta.ems.models.EmergencyRecord.Route
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A route in the system from the responder to the emergency

      • determineNearestResponder

        public static Responder determineNearestResponder(EmergencyRecord record)
        \brief Determines the nearest emergency responder according to the type of the emergency
        Parameters:
        record - the emergency record currently being created

        Determines an emergency responder according to the type of the emergency. Queries places from google, selects the nearest place, queries information about this place, and formats information according to a Responder. Creates a new Responder and returns it.

        Returns:
        an emergency Responder

      • calculateRoute

        private void calculateRoute()
        \brief Calculates 1 main route and 1 alternative route from the Responder to the emergency address

      • calculateDirections

        private void calculateDirections(java.lang.Boolean alternateRoute)
        \brief Retrieves the directions information between emergencyResponderAddress and emergencyLocationAddress, depending on the main or alternate route
        Parameters:
        alternateRoute - defines if the direction calculated concerns the main route or the alternate one

      • createHTMLRoute

        private java.io.File createHTMLRoute(java.lang.String HTMLRequest,
                                     java.lang.String filename,
                                     java.lang.Boolean avoidHighways,
                                     java.lang.Boolean avoidTolls)
        \brief Creates an HTML file containing the components required to display the map retrieved by the request in HTMHRequest. Saves it in "filename"
        Parameters:
        HTMLRequest - the URL of the request to include in the HTML file
        filename - the name of the file to create
        avoidHighways - if set to true, searches for routes avoiding highways if possible
        avoidTolls - if set to true, searches for routes avoiding tolls if possible
        Returns:
        a File object containing the HTML file created using the request

      • retrieveStaticMap

        public void retrieveStaticMap(java.lang.Boolean alternateRouteSelected)
        \brief Retrieve the static route (as an image file) according to the selected route: if alternateRouteSelected is set to false, the route retrieved is the main one, otherwise retrieves the alternate route
        Parameters:
        alternateRouteSelected - if set to true, retrieves alternate route static map, retrieves main route maps otherwise

      • retrieveKey

        private java.lang.String retrieveKey(java.lang.String keyToRetrieve)
        \brief Retrieves a key from the maps.private.properties
        Parameters:
        keyToRetrieve - the label of the key to retrieve from the file
        Returns:
        a String containing the key retrieved
